alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Johnson, northern Floyd, northeastern Breathitt and eastern Magoffin Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carver, or near Salyersville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marshallville, Gapville and Fredville around 245 PM EDT. Gypsy, Ivyton, Bradley, Burning Fork, Mashfork and Stringtown around 250 PM EDT. Brainard, Conley, Falcon and Blue River around 255 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Swamp Branch, Dobson, Riceville, Bonanza, Ballot, Dotson, Oil Springs, Dock, Leander, Patrick, East Point, Collista, Fitz, Denver, Bays Branch, Cliff, Barnetts Creek, Lancer, Paintsville, Prestonsburg, West Van Lear, Oaklawn Estates, Van Lear, Hagerhill, Buffalo, Woodland Estates, Perston Estates and Nero. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 74 and 76. Kentucky Highway 3 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 4. Kentucky Highway 80 in Floyd County between mile markers 13 and 14. U.S. Highway 23 in Floyd County between mile markers 11 and 21. U.S. Highway 23 in Johnson County between mile markers 0 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
